duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop external-facing Python web applications using RESTful microservice architecture and web application frameworks such as Flask
Build and expand ETL batch and streaming pipelining practices using tools such as Airflow
Manage and secure enterprise databases systems, data warehouses & Databricks workspaces
Collaborate with Data Scientists & Underwriters to understand business use-cases
Engage in the Agile methodology and work collaboratively in sprints
Support in active debugging and fixing bugs
Keep updated on the latest software/data stack in the industry
Learn about other areas of engineering tools and techniques such as Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), web app development, container orchestration, CI/CD pipeline design & web application security

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree (major/minor) or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, Physics, Bioinformatics – or equivalent program
